emailControl.intro_msg: Enter your email address below to receive a reset code.
emailControl.success_send_code_msg: A reset code has been sent to your email. Please copy it into the input box below and verify reset code.

phoneVerificationControl.intro_msg: Enter your phone number below to receive a reset code.

newPassword.PatternHelpText: 8-16 characters, containing 3 out of 4 of the following: Lowercase characters, uppercase characters, digits (0-9), and one or more of the following symbols: @ # $ % ^ & * - _ + = [ ] { } | \ : ' , ? / ` ~ " ( ) ; .
